name: Avast Virus Update File
summary: Learn about .VPX files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Avast periodically downloads VPX files to keep the software updated.
NOTE: Avast discontinued Pro Antivirus and Internet Security, and its software no longer utilizes VPX files.

description: A VPX file is a data file used by Avast antivirus and Internet security applications. It contains virus definitions and software update information that is referenced by Avast offerings to keep the software up-to-date with the latest protection signatures.
